title: Revenue Cycle Management SaaS
description: Built end-to-end medical billing platform handling $50M+ annual claims with 98% first-pass rate.
fullDescription: A comprehensive RCM platform for healthcare providers, handling everything from patient eligibility verification through claim submission, denial management, and payment posting.
problem: Healthcare providers losing revenue due to claim denials, slow collections, and manual billing processes.
constraints: Must integrate with 100+ insurance payers. Required HIPAA compliance and real-time eligibility checks.
approach: Built modular microservices architecture with event-driven workflows. Implemented automated claim scrubbing and denial prediction.
tradeoffs: Chose reliability over cutting-edge technology. Used battle-tested tools over newer alternatives.
execution: 2-year development as CTO. Scaled team from 3 to 12 engineers.
outcomes: $50M+ annual claims processed, 98% first-pass rate, 45% reduction in A/R days for clients.
whatIdImprove: Would have moved to PostgreSQL earlier for better transaction support. Would invest more in automated testing.
